mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sensuyt le Rommant de la Rose: Aultreme[n]t dit le songe vergier
Rommant de la Rose
Songe vergier
Guillaume, de Lorris, active 1230. Roman de la rose
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Guillaume de Lorris, active 1230
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: On les vend a Paris en la rue neufue nostre Dame a lenseigne de lescu de France
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: a⁸ b-e⁴ f⁸ g-k⁴ l⁸ m-p⁴ q⁸ r-z⁴ [et]⁴ A-C⁴ D⁸ E⁴ F⁶.
Colophon: Cy finist le Rommant de la Rose: nouuelleme[n]t imprime a paris Pour Alai[n] Lotrian demourant en la rue neufue nostre Dame a lenseigne de lescu de Fance.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Bookplate of Clarence H. Clark. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 394.
